channel.title: Santa-X
channel.description:
[CENTER] [B]Forums: [URL=http://"http://santa-x.org/community"]http://santa-x.org/community[/URL][/B] [B]Client Download:[URL=http://"http://uppit.com/qlj5lvxg63e4/Santa-X.jar"]http://uppit.com/qlj5lvxg63e4/Santa-X.jar[/URL] [/B][/CENTER]
[B][U]So you're probably thinking, why choose Santa-X?[/U][/B] [B][SIZE=2]Well, unlike other server's we dedicate our time and our hardest efforts to making the game enjoyable for you, this ranges from the Community that you play in to the Content on the game, we will always put in our hardest effort to make sure you're having fun on our game, not only that this isn't just [U]OUR[/U] game, it's your game too, we take your suggestions to the game very serious and if they're good, we'll try and implement it, you are the sole to our game.[/SIZE][/B]
[B][U]What else does Santa-X offer?[/U][/B] [B][SIZE=2]Not only our we dedicated and hard working, we also aim to build Santa-X to one of the best Runescape Private Server's known, this means that when we get donations they will be used for the Game, meaning that we will make sure we have the best Virtual Private Server deal we can get to ensure optimal performance, we will buy things for the server that we cannot implement ourselves, things like these are what we have to offer, we strive to make the game as fun as we can for you.[/SIZE][/B]
[CENTER][B][U]Santa-X's Features:[/U][/B] [B]VPS with DDoS Protection Great Stability Lag Free Lots of Bosses Many Minigames Custom Quests Active Staff Reliable Uptime Many Skills PVP Quest Cape requiring all Quests to be done Completionist capes etc Great Economy Fullscreen Client with settings
[B]These are only a small selection of our features.[/B] [/B][/CENTER]
[spoiler=Media!] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EYTNIBG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5B97rlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CjomRs1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LTXIur8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a0pd2ol.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[b]We hope to see you soon![/b]

item.title: Santa-X
item.dc:creator: @craigshotter08 craigshotter08
item.description:
@craigshotter08 wrote:

[CENTER]
[B]Forums: [URL=http://“http://santa-x.org/community”]http://santa-x.org/community[/URL][/B]
[B]Client Download:[URL=http://“http://uppit.com/qlj5lvxg63e4/Santa-X.jar”]http://uppit.com/qlj5lvxg63e4/Santa-X.jar[/URL] [/B][/CENTER]

[B][U]So you’re probably thinking, why choose Santa-X?[/U][/B]
[B][SIZE=2]Well, unlike other server’s we dedicate our time and our hardest efforts to making the game enjoyable for you, this ranges from the Community that you play in to the Content on the game, we will always put in our hardest effort to make sure you’re having fun on our game, not only that this isn’t just [U]OUR[/U] game, it’s your game too, we take your suggestions to the game very serious and if they’re good, we’ll try and implement it, you are the sole to our game.[/SIZE][/B]

[B][U]What else does Santa-X offer?[/U][/B]
[B][SIZE=2]Not only our we dedicated and hard working, we also aim to build Santa-X to one of the best Runescape Private Server’s known, this means that when we get donations they will be used for the Game, meaning that we will make sure we have the best Virtual Private Server deal we can get to ensure optimal performance, we will buy things for the server that we cannot implement ourselves, things like these are what we have to offer, we strive to make the game as fun as we can for you.[/SIZE][/B]

[CENTER][B][U]Santa-X’s Features:[/U][/B]
[B]VPS with DDoS Protection
Great Stability
Lag Free
Lots of Bosses
Many Minigames
Custom Quests
Active Staff
Reliable Uptime
Many Skills
PVP
Quest Cape requiring all Quests to be done
Completionist capes etc
Great Economy
Fullscreen Client with settings

[B]These are only a small selection of our features.[/B]
[/B][/CENTER]

[spoiler=Media!]





[/spoiler]

We hope to see you soon!
